title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: There is excessive flashing in the Control Example.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically only, it can be observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: When resizing the window vertically, the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames should not flash excessively.
SR:
1. Launch the Control Example.
2. Resize the window vertically.
3. Observe the behavior of the tabs in the TabFolder and Frames.
